Label.en: It allegedly belonged to King Esigie, and is said to represent his mother!
Label.fr: It allegedly belonged to King Esigie, and is said to represent his mother!
Label.es: It allegedly belonged to King Esigie, and is said to represent his mother!

Label.en: We know it must have been a great honour, since women were rarely represented in Benin’s art!
Label.fr: We know it must have been a great honour, since women were rarely represented in Benin’s art!
Label.es: We know it must have been a great honour, since women were rarely represented in Benin’s art!

Label.en: It’s made of ivory… elephant ivory, in fact!
Label.fr: It’s made of ivory… elephant ivory, in fact!
Label.es: It’s made of ivory… elephant ivory, in fact!
